With persistent heavy rainfall across the #Midlands today make sure you stay #floodaware

‚ö†Ô∏èSign up for flood alerts:
https://t.co/4G9UCfW5wr

urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text:
We are starting to issue #flood alerts for parts of the North West meaning that flooding is possible. 

Are you at risk of flooding? 

For the latest visit ‚ñ∂Ô∏è https://t.co/uGQ4g6A5Xn

There are a number of flood warnings in place across England, with heavy rainfall expected in the next few days.

By knowing what to do in a #flood, you can reduce the impacts to your home, family and possessions.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/MPz7FwsWeY 

#StormCristoph https://t.co/FMPUiziILV

#TeamEA are preparing for #StormChristoph 

Here @stewart_mounsey tells you what we are doing and how you can prepare yourself.  

Make sure you sign up for flood warnings here https://t.co/F1wbUI7A5G

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/eUI11Kdb6l

Expecting a number of @EnvAgency alerts & warnings to be issued this week as heavy rain is forecasted from Tues; make sure you're familiar with what these mean. Sign up for warnings at https://t.co/tX4sNhlku3

#Leeds #floodaware #beprepared üëá https://t.co/w3gUuDj0PA

Here's @stewart_mounsey a Flood Risk Manager at #TeamEA with an update and advice ahead of potential flooding this week

Prepare now for #StormChristoph and sign up for flood warnings in your area here https://t.co/F1wbUHPZe8

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/4dola2dANt

Weather warnings for heavy rain and flooding have been issued across South #Yorkshire.

I am monitoring the situation closely and our councils, @EnvAgency and @YorkshireWater are working round the clock to protect homes & businesses. Stay safe. https://t.co/dmEVKAbiO0

Can't stand all this jargon from @EnvAgencySE  
Over topping ,Flood fore sight ,Forecast flood severity
Rrrrrh Can these people not speak plain English  !
@pacrabtree

@LivingWithH2O's https://t.co/VjQw0mGsWb has loads of info that's really useful during these stormy days - how to sign up for flood warnings, how to check if you're at risk of flooding & what you should do if you are. @Hullccnews @ERfloodrisk @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater

urls.title: Be Flood Aware | Living With Water
urls.description: Your browser is unsupported and may have security vulnerabilities! Upgrade to a newer browser to experience this site in all it's glory. At Living With Water, our job is to help residents and businesses in Hull and the East Riding become more resilient to flooding. Part of this is our Be Flood Aware campaign, which aims to raise awareness of flood risks in our area and delivers practical advice and information to help local people protect their homes and businesses. Properties across Hull and the East

Flood alert from the @EnvAgencyYNE for Upper River Don and River Dearne catchment due to the heavy rain forecast.

Flooding is possible tomorrow. 

To see the latest flood warnings for Barnsley, please visit the Environment Agency website at https://t.co/iq8Rf0GAKv https://t.co/8ybsRDTLUN

An @EnvAgencyYNE flood alert is in force for the Upper River Calder due to the forecast for heavy rain.
